home.description: Desenvolvedor de software residente na Colômbia. Apoiador de trabalho remoto com 4+ anos de experiência trabalhando com equipes ágeis em todo o mundo. Especialista em JavaScript e front-end. Fanático por viagens e amante da comida.

about.title: More about me
about.description:
Born and raised in Colombia, I've been working remotely as a software engineer since 2016 for local and international companies with agile teams following good practices guidelines.

My focus is in front-end development and JavaScript stack while doing some bits on back-end as well. Besides web development, I'd like to work on videogame development, artificial intelligence and mentoring aspiring developers.

I'm currently available for freelance work. If you have a project or just want to know more about me, check out my CV or get in touch.

exit-dialog.title: Exit screen
exit-dialog.text: Do you really want to exit @:common.appname ?

progress: This website is a work in progress. Come back later to see more features!
